lore.weird-wares.glitter: A colourful item that causes blocks to give off an enchanted glow.
lore.weird-wares.unknown: A block that resembles Dirt with a question mark pattern. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.info_update: A block that resembles Dirt with the text 'update!' inscribed. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.info_update2: A block that resembles Dirt with the text 'update!' inscribed. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.glowing_obsidian: This block might have once had a purpose, but now just serves as a light source. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.nether_reactor: A block that serves as a base for a Nether Reactor - allowing the Nether to come to the Overworld. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.nether_reactor.active: An active Nether Reactor is allowing the Nether to come to the Overworld. It's a strange find.
lore.weird-wares.nether_reactor.used: This block was once used as a power source, but is now inert. It's a strange find.
